name: Minecart Madness (_peanutButter) (_peanutButter)
description:
Minecart Madness is an unfaithful re-creation of the Donkey Kong Country level 'Mine Cart Carnage."

The original DKC level is quite challenging, requiring players to jump their mine carts over a variety of frequent and fast-approaching obstacles, including broken down mine carts, incoming kremlings, and holes in the track.

Minecart Madness was originally made for Mini-Jam 73 using PICO-8. This version of the game has been re-built from the ground up using C and SDL2. Although fairly similar to the previous version, I've made a few quality of life changes which I feel improve the game's over-all enjoyability. You can play the original PICO-8 version in-browser here.

Please leave any feedback/suggestions in the comments below.
